Name: Base Station License, Friendly Best-Way Trans.Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Friendly Best-Way Transportation, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Friendly Best-Way Transportation, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1448 Coney Island Avenue in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#926
